column4: I want to share a folder across my network so my pda can map the network share, on windows I can do this easily, I've read up a little bit and seen that I'd have to use samba, isn't there many security vulnerabilities with this?
samba should be safe if you keep it within your network, also, samba is safer than xp network sharing
it runs on a few ports actually, just google iptables and samba
